name: 10% Up Sell
description:
A confident salesman, Delong Busk, works for (unnamed car) Dealership. Every month, he struggles to reach the numbers needed for the company big prize. This year, he is willing to do anything to sell his vehicles. With his ultimate power of persuasion he goes to work today ready to sell anything to anyone.

Use your persuasive powers to emphasize key words while pitching your sale. Reach them through your words and you will be able to convince anyone to buy your product.
